organizations: Cobra Pest Control and Tri-County Termite & Pest Control

thread.title: New QualityPro Certifications for September Announced
thread.title_full: New QualityPro Certifications for September Announced

title: New QualityPro Certifications for September Announced
text:
Subscribe New QualityPro Certifications for September Announced NPMA announces that the following companies just received QualityPro certifications: Cobra Pest Control and Tri-County Termite & Pest Control. October 16, 2015 
FAIRFAX, Va. — The National Pest Management Association announced companies that recently earned QualityPro designations . 
Two companies were certified in the following categories: GreenPro, QualityPro and QualityPro Food Safety. 
* Cobra Pest Control of East Greenwich, RI is now QualityPro certified * Tri-County Termite & Pest Control, of Carneys Point NJ is now offering QualityPro Food Safety certified service. Related Glyphosate and Acetamiprid Have Relatively Low Toxicity for Honey Bees, Study Finds October 15, 2015
